long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate the process of unfollowing those who don't follow you back and who you are following on Instagram, but in a way that mimics the behavior of a real user to reduce the risk of being detected as a bot. Ideal for those who need to unfollow multiple profiles.

With this tool, it is possible to unfollow 144 profiles per day. Unfortunately, Instagram has limits, and these limits vary from account to account. For this reason, we limit the processing time and the number of unfollows. We recommend using the extension sparingly to ensure its continuous functionality.

üß∞ Features
- Mass unfollow users who don't follow you back
- Mass unfollow users who you are following
- Auto unfollow process in the background
- Exclude Users that should not be unfollowed
- No proxy required

üìÉ How to Start Unfollowing?
- Choose the type of unfollowing
- Click the Start Unfollowing button

‚ö†Ô∏è Attention
The tool automatically unfollows 144 users per day (6 users per hour). There is a delay of 10 minutes between each unfollow to keep your account safe from Instagram‚Äôs detection. Even so, we also provide the setting option of adjusting the time interval for the request of unfollow.

üì¨ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.
